entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 70 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries or rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
